description: Episode number 5 of Series "The Academy". The third year cadets are graduating and the rehearsal is a test to many as standing out in sweltering heat for an hour sees many of them fainting. Kizzy will find out the outcome of her proposal to the Commandant to let her graduate, despite her injury, and attend the Graduation Ball which they are all looking forward to after three years of discipline and hard work.
